alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; Poinsett; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 1:39PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern St. Francis, southeastern Poinsett, northwestern Crittenden and eastern Cross Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 139 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Village Creek State Park, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Wynne, Earle, Parkin, Madison, Village Creek State Park, Caldwell, Crawfordsville, Colt, Widener, Jericho, Jennette, New Home, Turrell, Clarkedale, Three Forks, Cottonwood Corner, Booker, Fitzgerald Crossing and New Castle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas.
